summary: Adds an Athletics skill into Skyrim along with its own perks and perk tree. Takes up one of the skill tree slots created by Skyrim Custom Skills main file. Now also compatible with Merged Thievery Skill.
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Georgia][color=#ff7700][size=3][u]DESCRIPTION[/u][/size][/color][/font][/b]
This mod adds an Athletics skill to Skyrim along with perks and its own perk tree. Although not technically dependant on it, this file REQUIRES the main [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56249/?]SCS - Skyrim Custom Skills[/url] files to work. [color=#e06666]Please visit the Main files's page for details about the mod's mechanics and installation instructions[/color].

As of version 2.0, there is also a Lockpicking version which uses the perk tree slot created by "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21792/?]Merged Thievery Skill[/url]" by LukeH. This version is "standalone" and does NOT need the main SCS file to work. Just download it and make sure it is loaded AFTER the Merged Thievery Skill mod in your load order.

[b][font=Georgia][color=#ff7700][size=3][u]IMPORTANT UPDATE NOTE[/u][/size][/color][/font][/b]
If updating to version 2.0 from an older version, make sure you update to version 2.0 or higher of the Main file FIRST - bad things will happen otherwise...

[b][font=Georgia][color=#ff7700][size=3][u]ABOUT ATHLETICS[/u][/size][/color][/font][/b]
After playing Morrowind and Oblivion, I really missed the Athletics skill in Skyrim so I really wanted to bring it back. It now also incorporates what would have been Acrobatics in the previous games. It governs and is improved by running, walking, sprinting, swimming and jumping. Books that used to raise Athletics or Acrobatics in Morrowind or Oblivion (and are not associated with a skill in Skyrim) now raise the Athletics skill.

[b][font=Georgia][color=#ff7700][size=3][u]PERKS[/u][/size][/color][/font][/b]
Runner
Requires: Athletics 0/20/40/60/80
You move 3%/6%/9%/12%/15% faster.

Acrobat
Requires: Athletics 30/50/70, Runner
You can jump slightly/moderately/much higher.

Soft Landing
Requires: Athletics 40/60/80, Acrobat
Damage from falling from great heights is reduced by 25%/50%/75%.

Breath Taking
Requires: Athletics 25/50/75/100, Runner
Proper breathing allows you to recover stamina 25%/50%/75%/100% faster.

Sprinter
Requires: Athletics 40/70/100, Runner
Sprinting temporarily increases your stamina by 50/100/150.

Faster Than Shadows
Requires: Athletics 50/80, Sprinter
You become muffled/invisible while sprinting.

Water Sprint
Requires: Athletics 80, Faster Than Shadows
You can sprint across water surface.

Ram
Requires: Athletics 100, Water Sprint
You can sprint into enemies to stagger them or even knock them down if you have no shield or weapon drawn.  

Swimmer
Requires: Athletics 30/50/70, Runner
You swim 10%/20%/30% faster. Swimming increases the Athletics skill 20%/40%/60% faster.

Diving
Requires: Athletics 60, Swimmer
You love diving so much that you have learned to breathe underwater. Argonians with this perk are invulnerable while swimming.

Dynamic Hands
Requires: Athletics 30, Runner
You can use your empty hands to run 10% faster. (Only works if you have no weapon drawn.)

Nudity
Requires: Athletics 45, Runner
You run 20% faster while you are fully naked.

[b][font=Georgia][color=#ff7700][size=3][u]CREDITS[/u][/size][/color][/font][/b]
Bethesda - for Skyrim and Creation Kit!
The TES5Edit team - for TES5Edit, most of SCS was created with this sweet tool!
Mator - for Automation Tools for TES5Edit, I could never have worked with skill trees the way I did without the script provided there!
author: DavidTheFalcon
